title: Searge:今天可能出1.9 pre-release 3
author: 匿名
txt_content:
Searge@SeargeDP
There's a 66.7% chance that we will release 1.9 pre-release 3 later today. And we are still on track for the 1.9 release on Monday.


今日发布1.9 pre-release 3有百分之66.7的概率。这不影响我们在周一发布1.9。

replies.author: 雪狼神
replies.txt_content:
jeb:这周保证不发布1.9
匿名什么鬼)
